programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: It's Asia, The Day of the Jackal and Married at First Sight UK this time on the 'Box. Also, The Chase Celebrity Special, Love Triangle Australia and James May and the Dull Men.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Strictly Come Dancing, Married at First Sight UK and Rivals are on this time. Plus Antiques Roadshow, Love Triangle Australia, Ambulance, Countdown and ITV News(Trump).

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Gym-bunny James arrives for his date with his mum in tow. Fiona and Craig bond over shared life experiences. Can supernatural fiction writer Tracey lift Sairaphina's spirits?

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Welsh hairdresser Jess wants a man who's a cut above the rest. Charity shop manager Casey has his dream white wedding all mapped out. But is his date husband material?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: It's Asia, The Day of the Jackal and Married at First Sight UK this time on the 'Box. Also, The Chase Celebrity Special, Love Triangle Australia and James May and the Dull Men.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Strictly Come Dancing, Married at First Sight UK and Rivals are on this time. Plus Antiques Roadshow, Love Triangle Australia, Ambulance, Countdown and ITV News(Trump).

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The Mixing Bowl: Bijou New York diner The Mixing Bowl is haemorrhaging money thanks to manager Mike's out-of-control marketing plans. Can Gordon get things back on track?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Seascape: Gordon Ramsay visits the Seascape restaurant in the seaside village of Islip, on Long Island in New York, where owner Peter has nearly a million dollars of debt.

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Sienna and Cleo's relationship is still fragile. Ant finds himself in hot water. Old friends return to help lift Donny's spirits. And a revenge plot closes in on one resident.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister that features a variety of cats doing strange things, some soldiers stuck in the sand and a dog balancing on a rope.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Winner Winner Turkey Dinner: Jay's Thanksgiving toast honours the entire family on their recent successes, even though everyone knows that they aren't quite true.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Brushes with Celebrity: The Pritchett-Dunphy-Tucker clan recount their celebrity encounters. When Phil shows a house to his musical hero, he's determined to make a good impression.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Tough Love: After leaving his real estate firm to strike out on his own, Phil decides that a solo camping trip in the wild is just what he needs to boost his confidence.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: He Said, She Shed: The homeowners association deny Claire's request to build a 'She Shed' in the garden, and only Luke and Phil know the real reason why.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Dear Beloved Family: Gloria rushes Phil to hospital for emergency surgery when he experiences intense stomach pains.

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: The One with All the Pixies: Sam has 13k to spend on his pixie wedding to his love, Luanne. Will Luanne, who dreams of a traditional service, appreciate his scheme?

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: The One with the Dinosaurs: Elle has her heart set on a classy wedding at Liverpool's iconic Liver Building. But Phil plans a big day to go down in history.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Lela's: In California, Gordon Ramsay visits Lela's, a fine dining restaurant run by inexperienced owner Lela and young chef Ricky. Can Gordon save them from complete disaster?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Sebastian's: Gordon Ramsay visits Sebastian's, a pizzeria in Los Angeles. The customers are scarce and the debt is mounting. Can Gordon turn the restaurant's fortunes around?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Finn McCool's: Gordon Ramsay visits Finn McCool's, a traditional Irish pub in the Hamptons, where the family feuding has got out of hand. Can Gordon mediate?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The Olde Stone Mill: Gordon Ramsay visits The Olde Stone Mill in Tuckahoe, New York. The restaurant has been restored, but owner Dean can't get customers through the door.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brother from the Same Planet: When Homer is late picking up Bart from a school football game, Bart gets a surrogate dad from an agency.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I Love Lisa: On Valentine's Day, Lisa takes pity on Ralph and gives him a card. But when he falls in love with her, it leads to a bitter feud between their families.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Duffless: Homer fails a breathalyser test while driving home from the Duff brewery and has to quit drinking for a month.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: So It Has Come to This: The Simpsons' Clip Show: Bart's special April Fools' Day prank seriously misfires when the whole house explodes.

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: (1992) Comedy starring Whoopi Goldberg. A casino singer who witnesses a Mob murder goes into hiding at a convent, where she soon has the choir rocking. With Maggie Smith.

programme.title: New: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brand new series - Homer and Her Sisters: A self-help expert prompts Homer to do something unthinkable: get to know Patty and Selma.

programme.title: New: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brand new series - The Man Who Flew Too Much: Homer's old bowling team, the Pin Pals, reunite. But disaster befalls them on their helicopter ride to the state championships.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: (2019) Action-thriller sequel. Secret agent Mike Banning (Gerard Butler) goes on the run when he's framed for an attack on the President. Can he clear his name?
